title: We Cry Together (A Short Film)
lyrics:
1 Contributor
We Cry Together (A Short Film) Lyrics
[Intro: Taylour Paige & Kendrick Lamar]
Agh, I fucking hate you
I swear I'm not gon' live like this
On my momma, I swear to God
Bitch always on some bullshit
For real
You ain't shit

[Verse 1: Kendrick Lamar & Taylour Paige]
I swear, I'm tired of these emotional-ass, ungrateful-ass bitches (Get the fuck out)
Unstable-ass, confrontational-ass dumb bitches
Wanna bring a nigga down (Stay with me), even when I'm tryna do right
We can go our separate ways right now, you could move on with your life, bitch
Fuck you, nigga, you love a pity party, I won't show up
Always act like your shit don't stink, motherfucker, grow up
Forever late for shit, won't buy shit, sit around and deny shit
Fuck around on a side bitch, then come fuckin' up my shit
Fuckin' up yo' sh—? Bitch, you must be bleedin' and some more shit (Ooh, I hate you)
Bitch, I don't owе shit, fuck yo' feelings, you on some ho shit
See, I don't know why you like playin' mind games with mе
Bitch, I ain't slow nor ditsy, I know when you bein' distant
I know when you fake busy, get out yo' feelings and miss me with that reverse psychology
You bitch, you trippin', who got you that Rollie chain?
And who put that car in my name?
What, you think I'ma kiss yo' ass or somethin'?
Nah, nigga, you fuckin' lame



[Chorus: Kendrick Lamar & Taylour Paige]
You know what? Fuck you, bitch (Fuck you, nigga)
Nah, fuck you, bitch (Nah, fuck you, nigga)
Fuck you, bitch (Nah, fuck you, nigga)
Nah, fuck you, bitch (Fuck you, nigga)
Fuck you (Fuck you), fuck you (Fuck you), fuck you (Fuck you), fuck you, bitch (Fuck you)
Weird-ass (Fuck you), stupid-ass bitch (Ooh)

[Verse 2: Taylour Paige & Kendrick Lamar]
Wastin' my time and energy tryna be good to you
Lost friends, family, gained more enemies 'cause of you
Bitches starin' at me at Zara, hoes scratchin' my cars up
Should've followed my mind in '09 just to move to Georgia
Swear to fucking God, ooh
Oh, what, that's my fault now? Bitch, you power trippin' or guilt trippin'?
I held your ass down, stupid-ass
You just kept me down, that's a big difference
Stressin' myself tryna figure why I'm not good enough
Goin' to church, prayin' for you, searchin' for good in us
Lil' dick-ass nigga that's tryna go big
But you was suckin' this dick though
Well, shit, I shoulda sucked his
What you say?
I shoulda found a bigger dick
Bitch, get the fuck out my face, bro
Oh, what, you mad?
Shut up, bitch, you got me fucked up today, on God
Haha, ah-ha, you mad, lil' feelings is shot
Go text that raggedy bitch and tell her you all that she got
Let her know you packin' yo' shit and gotta move by the first
Man, give me these fuckin' keys
Give me my keys, I'ma be late for work
Fuck yo' job, today gon' be the day you walk to that bitch, bitch
Give me my fuckin' keys
Nope, I like you parked in that bitch, ho
Give me my keys, bro
On God, you ain't gettin' these keys
Give me my fucking keys
Ah, now you mad at me, I got you hollerin' for nothin'
I do the same when we fuckin'
Act like that pussy ain't loose
I'd rather act like I'm cummin'
I'd rather fuck off the juice
I'd rather fuck on your cousin
Bitch, you said you gon' fuck who?
You heard me, nigga, it's nothin'



[Chorus: Kendrick Lamar & Taylour Paige]
You know what? Fuck you, bitch (Fuck you, nigga)
Stupid-ass, fuck you, bitch (Fuck you nigga)
Feasty-ass, dirty bitch (Nah, fuck you, nigga)
Man, fuck you, bitch (Fuck you, fuck you)
Fuck you, fuck you (Fuck you, loser-ass), fuck you, fuck you, bitch (Fuck you), weirdo-ass
Ooh, I fuckin'—

[Verse 3: Kendrick Lamar & Taylour Paige]
I don't even know why I fuck with you
Ah, I'll be damned if I'm stuck with you
Changed my number, I'm duckin' you, bitch
Bitch, whatever is comfortable
This the type of shit couples do?
Shoulda thought about cuffin' you
Nigga, you dirty and you broke
Ho, you goofy and gullible, goofy-ass
Them insecurities you got won't mindfuck me
Womanizer, got no affection from yo' mama, I see
Don't speak on my mama, the fuck is yo' problem?
That bitch don't like me anyways
Bitch, she gave you the Honda
And used that shit to throw it in my face
I find it funny you just can't apologize
Egotistic, narcissistic, love, you're all lies
See, you the reason why strong women fucked up
Why they say it's a man's world, see, you the reason for Trump
You the reason we overlooked, underpaid, under-booked, under shame
If you look, I'on't speak, then I'm called on my name
I am flawed, I am pained, never yours, I remain
You the reason bitches start fuckin' with bitches when they change
You the reason bitches start callin' y'all bitches, 'cause y'all useless
You the reason Harvey Weinstein had to see his conclusion
You the reason R. Kelly can't recognize that he's abusive
Man, you the reason why bitches like you still playin' his music (Ooh, my God, like)
(How are you still—? How are you still fucking talking?) And I'm tired of these emotional-ass, ungrateful-ass bitches
Fake innocent, fake feminist, stop pretendin' (Fake, nigga? Fake?)
Y'all sentiment ain't realer than what you defendin' (Oh, my god)
It's a split decision, broads like you and real victims
Let's talk the truth, women in general just can't get along (Explain, nigga)
Uh, when Tash got a man, you didn't pick up the phone (Explain, nigga)
Uh, when Nate found a job, you said you goin' home (Explain)
Why R&B bitches don't feature on each other songs then?
What the fuck is you talkin' 'bout?
Never mind, bitch, I'm walkin' out
Whatever, nigga, I'm off you now
Yo' evil ass kept me well in doubt
Pussy nigga, best watch your mouth
Pussy and mouth is all you got
Lay this pussy back on the couch
Doggie style, then you get on top



[Outro: Taylour Paige & Kendrick Lamar]
Fuck me, nigga (I'ma fuck you, bitch)
Nah, fuck me, nigga, fuck me (I'ma fuck you, bitch)
Nah, fuck me, nigga, fuck me (Take that shit off)
Ooh, I swear to God I fuckin' hate you
Mm, ah, ah
Mhm, mm
Ah, just a break
